issue.title: [CF 984] New Condition 'Buff - Seen'
issue.body:
Condition for whether or not a certain buff as been seen (at least once). Useful for something like a placebo to track enemy talents in arenas, IE if it has 'seen' Blood Horror, then it knows to enable or disable a certain icon based on condition. Might also be useful for Spell Casts or something.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #984 | Raw

comments.body:
I would never make this into a condition because it has to be reset at some point, and that's not something that can be configured nicely for a condition.

You can do it with a Combat Event icon with a long timer. Or a Unit Cooldown icon, for that matter. A Unit Cooldown icon would actually work better since it resets the cooldowns of enemies when an arena game starts.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
